Help:Node.title: study
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: @study ; @study [skill] with [teacher] (system pending consideration, currently use teach)
EXAMPLE: @study ; @study eastern with Azrael
Allows you to study a skill. The designated teacher must know how to teach, must be better at you in the skill, and must want to teach you. You will have to study for some time to have an opportunity to learn a skill.
SEE ALSO: ,
